Polygon file name in your GitHub repo, or external web address (or leave blank if no polygon data)
When a polygon is clicked, display "img" property in geoJSON, if available.

Setting: Display Polygon Labels at Zoom Level
Hints: Name of label from GeoJSON (or leave blank for none)
Labels will appear at this zoom level and above

List properties of GeoJSON layers to be displayed, separated by semicolons. (Leave blank if no polygon data) List labels to display for each property in the order listed above, separated with semicolons, but none at the end. (Leave blank if no polygon data)

List ranges to group data for each property in the order listed above. Use either numbers (which will appear with dashes) or text labels (such as low, medium, high). Separate dividers by commas, and separate each range with a semicolon, but none at end. (Leave blank if no polygon data)
EXPLAIN that terms after commas are aliases...
Select a ColorBrewer palette for all property ranges listed above.

Leave blank to use the automatic Color Pallette above, OR manually list color words (e.g. "green") or hex codes (e.g. #EE6A50) to select colors for the divisions in each range above. The number of colors must match the number of dividers in each range. Separate dividers by commas, and separate each range with a semicolon, but none at the end.
Leave blank for default (0.7) or insert number between 0 (transparent) and 1 (opaque).
Leave blank for default (white) or insert a color word (such as "black") or hex code.
